headline: Kroger (NYSE:KR) Misses Q3 CY2025 Sales Expectations
summary: Grocery retail giant Kroger (NYSE:KR) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales flat year on year at $33.86 billion. Its GAAP loss of $2.02 per share was significantly below analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Kroger (NYSE:KR) Misses Q3 CY2025 Sales Expectations

headline: I’m 61 and sick and tired of working. My wife and I have $1.5M saved. Is that enough to retire?
summary: According to the Center for Retirement Research, the average retirement age is now three years later than it was in the 1990s.

headline: Limitless X Appoints Seasoned Consumer Products and Manufacturing Executive Daniel Sanders as President
summary: LOS ANGELES, Jan. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Limitless X Holdings Inc. (OTCQX: LIMX), a diversified global consumer products, wellness, entertainment, and lifestyle company founded by entrepreneur Jas Mathur, today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Daniel Sanders as President, effective immediately. Mr. Sanders brings over 20 years of senior executive experience across consumer nutraceuticals, wellness, product development, large-scale GMP manufacturing, and national retail d

headline: A Look At Kroger (KR) Valuation As Shares Trade Near $62.96 After Recent Move
summary: Kroger (KR) is back on investors’ radar after its recent share price move, with the stock closing at $62.96. That puts fresh focus on how its current valuation lines up with recent fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Kroger. The 1-year total shareholder return of 5.97% and 3-year total shareholder return of 45.74% point to steadily building momentum, even though the 90-day share price return of 5.86% suggests some recent cooling after a strong multi year run. If Kroger has you thinking...

headline: Kroger: E-Commerce Inflection Point, Aggressive Buybacks Pave Way For A Strategic Pivot
summary: Kroger (KR) reiterated Buy: solid financials, $2.9B FCF, $2B buybacks, and +17% eCommerce growth.
